fields.name: AllocationState
fields.description: Allocation state of the compute. Possible values are: steady - Indicates that the compute is not resizing. There are no changes to the number of compute nodes in the compute in progress. A compute enters this state when it is created and when no operations are being performed on the compute to change the number of compute nodes. resizing - Indicates that the compute is resizing; that is, compute nodes are being added to or removed from the compute.

fields.name: AllocationStateTransitionTime
fields.description: The time at which the compute entered its current allocation state.

fields.name: CurrentNodeCount
fields.description: The number of compute nodes currently assigned to the compute.

fields.name: EnableNodePublicIP
fields.description: Enable or disable node public IP address provisioning. Possible values are: Possible values are: true - Indicates that the compute nodes will have public IPs provisioned. false - Indicates that the compute nodes will have a private endpoint and no public IPs.

fields.name: Errors
fields.description: Collection of errors encountered by various compute nodes during node setup.

fields.name: NodeStateCounts
fields.description: Counts of various node states on the compute.

fields.name: PropertyBag
fields.description: A property bag containing additional properties.

fields.name: RemoteLoginPortPublicAccess
fields.description: State of the public SSH port. Possible values are: Disabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on all nodes of the cluster. Enabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is open on all nodes of the cluster. NotSpecified - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on all nodes of the cluster if VNet is defined, else is open all public nodes. It can be default only during cluster creation time, after creation it will be either enabled or disabled.

fields.name: Subnet
fields.description: Virtual network subnet resource ID the compute nodes belong to.

fields.name: TargetNodeCount
fields.description: The target number of compute nodes for the compute. If the allocationState is resizing, this property denotes the target node count for the ongoing resize operation. If the allocationState is steady, this property denotes the target node count for the previous resize operation.

fields.name: UserAccountCredentials
fields.description: Credentials for an administrator user account that will be created on each compute node.

fields.name: VirtualMachineImage
fields.description: Virtual Machine image for AML Compute - windows only
